name: Pride (SamMeurer)
description:
Play in full screen for best experience. 

This is a narrative about a gay man as he reflects on his past, present, and future. Using the Pride flag and its symbolism as the foundation of my story, I wanted to create this man's flashbacks through the symbolic words behind the colors of the pride flag. 

Red - Life

Orange - Healing

Yellow - Sunlight

Green - Nature

Blue - Harmony

Purple - Spirit

I hope you will find some type of meaning in this story like I have by writing it. Thank you.
